item.title: About
item.description: Cdoejago develop software. Learn more and contribute on GitHub.

item.title: Jumping through Hoops - Installing the Java SDK
item.description: Installing the Java SDK … yet again … for the eleventy billionth time Always looking out for that quick and easy way to install the Java SDK. This time, I’m going to try sdkman which is a tool for managing multiple versions of the Java SDK. It’s a little more than that, but that’s what I’m going to use it for. I’m using Debian 10, so I’ll follow the instructions for Linux.

item.title: One Dumbass Tool to Rule Them All
item.description: Plato: Greetings, Homer, wise in the ways of technology! I, Plato, am a fervent advocate of wielding a diverse set of tools in the pursuit of crafting digital wonders. Homer: Hey there, Plato! I’ve been using this one tool for as long as I can remember. It’s like my trusty ol’ donut â€“ reliable and delicious. Plato: Ah, Homer, your analogy is as delightful as a philosopher’s discourse at the agora.
